mapper.select: SELECT ACC_CD AS accCd, ACC_DTL_CD AS accDtlCd, ACC_LONG_NM AS accShrtNm FROM T_AC0100 WHERE ACC_LEVEL='5' AND ACC_LONG_NM LIKE '%' + #{account} + '%' OR ACC_LEVEL='5' AND ACC_CD LIKE '%' + #{account} + '%'
SELECT DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM FROM T_SC1010 WHERE DEPT_CD LIKE '%' + #{dept} + '%' OR DEPT_NM LIKE '%' + #{dept} + '%'
SELECT CUST_CD, CUST_NM FROM T_AC0300 WHERE CUST_CD LIKE '%' + #{cust} + '%' OR CUST_NM LIKE '%' + #{cust} + '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN F.CONFIRM_YN = '0' THEN '미승인' ELSE '승인' END) AS CONFIRM_YN, (CASE WHEN A.JS_CODE = '01' THEN '현금' WHEN A.JS_CODE = '02' THEN '' ELSE '대체' END) AS JS_CODE, CONVERT(VARCHAR,(CONVERT(DATE, A.SLIP_DATE)),111) AS SLIP_DATE, A.SLIP_NO AS SLIP_NO, A.SLIP_SEQ AS SLIP_SEQ, (A.ACC_CD + '-' + A.ACC_DTL_CD) AS ACC_CD, B.ACC_LONG_NM AS ACC_LONG_NM, A.DRCR_GB AS DRCR_GB, A.ACC_AMT AS ACC_AMT, C.DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM, E.CUST_NM AS CUST_NM, D.PJT_NM AS PJT_NM, A.DESCR AS DESCR FROM T_AC1120 A INNER JOIN T_AC0100 B ON A.ACC_CD = B.ACC_CD AND A.ACC_DTL_CD = B.ACC_DTL_CD INNER JOIN T_SC1010 C ON A.BELONG_DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD LEFT JOIN T_SM3000 D ON A.PROJ_CD = (D.PJT_CD + D.PJT_TYPE) LEFT JOIN T_AC0300 E ON A.CUST_CD = E.CUST_CD LEFT JOIN T_AC1110 F ON A.SLIP_DATE = F.SLIP_DATE AND A.SLIP_NO = F.SLIP_NO WHERE A.SLIP_DATE BETWEEN #{FSLIP_DATE} AND #{ESLIP_DATE} AND A.ACC_CD LIKE '%' + #{ACC_CD} + '%' AND A.ACC_DTL_CD LIKE '%' + #{ACC_DTL_CD} + '%' AND A.ACC_UNIT LIKE '%' + #{ACC_UNIT} + '%' AND A.CUST_CD LIKE '%' + #{CUST_CD} + '%' AND A.JS_CODE LIKE '%' + #{JS_CODE} + '%' AND A.BELONG_DEPT_CD LIKE '%' + #{DEPT_CD} + '%' AND F.CONFIRM_YN LIKE '%' + #{CONFIRM_YN} + '%') AS t1 WHERE t1.JS_CODE LIKE'%' + #{SJS_CODE} + '%' ORDER BY SLIP_DATE DESC;
